Would like to seek advice if I should purchase a travel insurance which comprise of Skiing coverage? Any recommended insurers based on your own personal experience? My budget is about $50 to $80. Gabriel LeeLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 28 Sep 2018I'd suggest that you should just incase anything were to happen. By then, it would've been too late already. A quick check on MoneySmart's comparison platform for travel insurance shows quite a few insurers covering skiing (snow/ice sports), such as FWD & Etiqa. Nowadays travel insurance are highly affordable especially with promo codes and cashback. Purchase FWD for my 2 weeks trip to Taiwan and the medical claim process was both smooth and successful. Use this tool to check out, https://www.moneysmart.sg/travel-insuranceBetter to be safe than sorry & happy holidays!0 comments0
